name: part_011
file: tmp_【3D SHOWCASE】A ZOMBIE IDOL'S DREAM COME TRUE？! #KureijiOllie3D [qk0HSjgN5LQ]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_011.mov

scenes.description: MC section featuring merchandise announcements (Super Kawaii Zombie Coach Jacket), a game project reveal, and a heartfelt message to fans.

subtitles.original: And it's Ollie-themed as well! So with it there, with it there, with it up there, it was so good! I see all of you guys too!
subtitles.english: And it's Ollie-themed as well! So with it there, with it there, with it up there, it was so good! I see all of you guys too!

subtitles.original: Hi! Wah, seneng banget! Seneng kan? Keren kan?
subtitles.english: Hi! Wow, I'm so happy! You're happy too, right? It's cool, isn't it?

subtitles.original: Top-A Ollie! Uh oh, barusan adalah Identity Voices.
subtitles.english: Top-A Ollie! Uh oh, that was Identity Voices just now.

subtitles.original: Tapi bukan hanya itu, kita... Ollie ada beberapa pengumuman nih.
subtitles.english: But that's not all, we... Ollie has a few announcements.

subtitles.original: Yang pertama namanya... wait, so merch that I prepared for everyone!
subtitles.english: The first one is... wait, so merch that I prepared for everyone!

subtitles.original: Ini dia merch yang Ollie siapkan buat kalian! うちのみなさんのために用意しました！
subtitles.english: Here's the merch Ollie prepared for you! I prepared this for all of you!

subtitles.original: それでは、これだ！ドン！
subtitles.english: So, here it is! Bam!

subtitles.original: The SUPER KAWAII ZOMBIE COACH JACKET! Yeah!
subtitles.english: The SUPER KAWAII ZOMBIE COACH JACKET! Yeah!

subtitles.original: So, um... I noticed that most of my goods, not all of them were wearable.
subtitles.english: So, um... I noticed that most of my goods, not all of them were wearable.

subtitles.original: Nggak semuanya portable gitu kan ya.
subtitles.english: Not all of them are wearable, right?

subtitles.original: Ini Ollie ingin membikin sesuatu yang bisa kalian pakai langsung.
subtitles.english: Ollie wanted to make something that you can wear directly.

subtitles.original: Kita bilang aja nih seragam kalian. You guys can see this as your uniforms!
subtitles.english: Let's just call this your uniform. You guys can see this as your uniforms!

subtitles.original: So I worked real hard so that you guys can have this.
subtitles.english: So I worked real hard so that you guys can have this.

subtitles.original: It's going to be really cool! Unik banget sih.
subtitles.english: It's going to be really cool! It's very unique.

subtitles.original: Yang aslinya jauh lebih keren. The real thing is a lot cooler than it is.
subtitles.english: The real thing is much cooler. The real thing is a lot cooler than it is.

subtitles.original: お手元でもっとかっこよかったよ！ぜひぜひね！
subtitles.english: It's even cooler in person! So by all means!

subtitles.original: Ini nanti bakal dijual berbarengan bersama Reine dan Anya setelah mini live kita.
subtitles.english: This will be on sale along with Reine and Anya's after our mini-live.

subtitles.original: After our mini-live, this will be on sale, so make sure that you guys are readying your pockets! Ne?
subtitles.english: After our mini-live, this will be on sale, so make sure that you guys are readying your pockets! Right?

subtitles.original: Oh, いっぱい、いっぱい買ってね！
subtitles.english: Oh, please buy lots and lots of them!

subtitles.original: Kemudian ada satu lagi nih pengumuman, yaitu ini, ini... hehehe.
subtitles.english: Then there's one more announcement, and it's this... hehehe.

subtitles.original: Eksklusif hanya untuk kalian yang nonton, Ollie akan bikin...
subtitles.english: Exclusively for those of you watching, Ollie is going to make...

subtitles.original: Yeah! I'll be making a game! It's a ゲームをつくりますよ！
subtitles.english: Yeah! I'll be making a game! I'm making a game!

subtitles.original: Untuk detailnya, nonton aja nanti sampai akhir stream!
subtitles.english: For the details, just watch until the end of the stream!

subtitles.original: If you guys want to know more about the details, make sure you watch until the end of the ohirome stream!
subtitles.english: If you guys want to know more about the details, make sure you watch until the end of the ohirome stream!

subtitles.original: Oh, kemudian yang terakhir, ada sesuatu yang Ollie ingin sangat... b-b-b...
subtitles.english: Oh, and lastly, there's something Ollie really wants to... b-b-b...

subtitles.original: ...nggak bisa ngomong. Sorry, so nervous.
subtitles.english: ...I can't speak. Sorry, I'm so nervous.

subtitles.original: Ada yang ingin Ollie sampaikan kepada kalian.
subtitles.english: There's something I want to tell you guys.

subtitles.original: I want to really tell you guys. 言いたいことがあります。
subtitles.english: I want to really tell you guys. There's something I want to say.

subtitles.original: Tolong dengarkan ya.
subtitles.english: Please listen.

subtitles.original: Nah, um... actually I already summed it up over here.
subtitles.english: Nah, um... actually I already summed it up over here.

subtitles.original: Sebenarnya udah Ollie rangkum sih ya kata-katanya Ollie di sebelah sini.
subtitles.english: Actually, I've summarized my words over here.

subtitles.original: I already have everything written out, but just so that we're on the same page...
subtitles.english: I already have everything written out, but just so that we're on the same page...

subtitles.original: ...I want to say thank you from the very bottom of my heart because...
subtitles.english: ...I want to say thank you from the very bottom of my heart because...

subtitles.original: ...you know, if it weren't for you guys, if you guys didn't give me a chance to get on this stage...
subtitles.english: ...you know, if it weren't for you guys, if you guys didn't give me a chance to get on this stage...

subtitles.original: ...I would've only been an undead. Ollie mungkin nggak akan ada di sini.
subtitles.english: ...I would've only been an undead. Ollie might not even be here.

subtitles.original: Dan berkat kalian Ollie juga tetap di sini. It's thanks to you guys that I'm still here.
subtitles.english: And thanks to you, Ollie is still here. It's thanks to you guys that I'm still here.

subtitles.original: そうね、みんなのおかげで、オーリーはここに立っているよ。
subtitles.english: That's right, thanks to everyone, Ollie is standing here.

subtitles.original: こんなに... だからね、めちゃくちゃ感謝してるよ。
subtitles.english: This much... so I'm incredibly grateful.

subtitles.original: Mm, ini agak emoi ya. It's a little bit emotional, but I really do mean it.
subtitles.english: Mm, this is a bit emotional. It's a little bit emotional, but I really do mean it.

subtitles.original: I know it's a little bit cliché, I know you guys hear it a lot, but this comes for me personally...
subtitles.english: I know it's a little bit cliché, I know you guys hear it a lot, but this comes for me personally...

subtitles.original: ...the very deepest part of my heart. Ini datang dari hati Ollie yang terdalam.
subtitles.english: ...the very deepest part of my heart. This comes from the deepest part of Ollie's heart.

subtitles.original: Oleh karena itu, terima kasih banyak.
subtitles.english: Because of that, thank you very much.

subtitles.original: いつも応援してくれて、本当にありがとうございました。
subtitles.english: Thank you so much for always supporting me.

subtitles.original: Um, and again, I love you guys all so much!
subtitles.english: Um, and again, I love you guys all so much!

subtitles.original: You guys mean the world to me. You guys never know. So thank you very much.
subtitles.english: You guys mean the world to me. You guys never know. So thank you very much.

subtitles.original: Wah, emoi na! Agak sedikit emosional ya.
subtitles.english: Wow, how emotional! It's a little bit emotional.

subtitles.original: Udah nangis belum? Are you guys crying? Hehe.
subtitles.english: Are you crying yet? Are you guys crying? Hehe.

subtitles.original: Oh, kalau gitu... ada satu lagi nih. Kalau belum itu, belum selesai nggak sih?
subtitles.english: Oh, in that case... there's one more. If we haven't done that, it's not over yet, right?

subtitles.original: If we haven't sung that, it's not over yet, isn't it? あれはまだあるよ！
subtitles.english: If we haven't sung that, it's not over yet, isn't it? That is still to come!

subtitles.original: みんな知ってる？Do you guys know? Apakah kalian tahu?
subtitles.english: Does everyone know? Do you guys know? Do you know?

subtitles.original: Mm, THE LAST SONG! Of course, from the very first thing that I've ever produced myself!
subtitles.english: Mm, THE LAST SONG! Of course, from the very first thing that I've ever produced myself!

subtitles.original: Yeah! Kalau gitu kita langsung aja tanpa basa-basi lagi.
subtitles.english: Yeah! Then let's just get straight to it without further ado.

subtitles.original: This is the final song! Lagu terakhir! 最後の曲！
subtitles.english: This is the final song! The last song! The final song!

subtitles.original: JOLLIE JOLLIE! Yeah!
subtitles.english: JOLLIE JOLLIE! Yeah!

subtitles.original: クーレイジオリー！！
subtitles.english: KUREIJI JOLLIE!!

subtitles.original: クーレイジオリー！！
subtitles.english: KUREIJI JOLLIE!!

subtitles.original: クーレイジオリー！！
subtitles.english: KUREIJI JOLLIE!!

subtitles.original: へ？私？
subtitles.english: Eh? Me?

subtitles.original: 退屈な日常
subtitles.english: A boring daily life

subtitles.original: このままでいいの？
subtitles.english: Is it okay to stay like this?

subtitles.original: 通知いって携帯
subtitles.english: The notification goes off, and on my phone...

subtitles.original: 見てるばかりで何で？
subtitles.english: ...I'm just staring at it, why?

subtitles.original: ハート止まっていても
subtitles.english: Even if my heart has stopped

subtitles.original: 心震わせたいの
subtitles.english: I want to make my soul tremble

subtitles.original: これからが Show time
subtitles.english: From now on it's Show time

subtitles.original: 歩き出してこうか
subtitles.english: Shall we start walking?

subtitles.original: One Two Three で星を見つけて
subtitles.english: Find a star with One Two Three

subtitles.original: Four Five Six で君を見つけたの
subtitles.english: Found you with Four Five Six

subtitles.original: Seven Eight Nine で夢を見つめて
subtitles.english: Gaze at a dream with Seven Eight Nine
